summary: A website showcasing home usage glass products such as mirrors, windows, slider doors, and other glass-related ornaments/decor.
architectural_notes: Static website showcasing home glass products; no backend required initially
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Wide panoramic hero banner showing an elegant modern living room interior with glass elements including large windows, a decorative mirror, and a glass slider door, natural light flooding in, warm gold and white tones (hero-banner.dim_1400x600.png)
- Decorative wall mirror with a slim gold frame against a soft white wall, studio product shot (product-mirror.dim_600x600.png)
- Modern floor-to-ceiling glass window panel in a bright interior setting, studio product shot (product-window.dim_600x600.png)
- Sleek glass sliding door with matte aluminum frame in a contemporary home hallway, studio product shot (product-slider-door.dim_600x600.png)
- Elegant glass partition wall panel with frosted lower half, bright office or home interior, studio product shot (product-partition.dim_600x600.png)
- Decorative glass ornament centerpiece on a marble tabletop, warm gold light, studio product shot (product-ornament.dim_600x600.png)
- Modern glass interior door with thin black frame and clear glass panels, studio product shot (product-glass-door.dim_600x600.png)
- Brand logo mark — stylized letter G made of overlapping translucent glass shapes in gold and white on transparent background (logo-icon.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Create a visually elegant visual theme for the entire site inspired by glass, light, and modern interior design — using clean whites, soft grays, and warm gold/champagne accents with a refined sans-serif typography and airy layout. Apply this theme consistently across all pages.

Create a homepage featuring a full-width hero section with a tagline about home glass products, a featured products section highlighting items like mirrors, windows, slider doors, and glass ornaments, and a brief brand introduction section.

Build a product catalog page with category filtering. Categories must include: Mirrors, Windows, Slider Doors, Glass Doors, Glass Ornaments/Decor, and Partition Walls. Each product card must show a product image, name, category, and short description.

Build a product detail page that displays a larger product image, full product name, category, detailed description, dimensions/specifications fields, and a 'Request a Quote' or 'Contact Us' call-to-action button.
Implement a site-wide navigation bar with the brand logo/name 'GlassHome Studio', links to Home and Catalog pages, and a footer with a short tagline and copyright notice.
Render generated product and hero images from frontend/public/assets/generated as static assets displayed on the homepage hero, product cards, and product detail pages.

new_feature_requests.summary: Homepage with featured glass products (mirrors, windows, slider doors, ornaments)
Product catalog/listing page with categories for different glass product types
Product detail page with images and description
Navigation and branding for a glass/home decor store

Define and store all product data in the Motoko backend. Each product record must include: id, name, category, shortDescription, fullDescription, specs (key-value pairs), and imagePath. Expose query functions to fetch all products and fetch a single product by id, as well as a function to filter products by category.
